title: Docker build with CUDNN6 not working.
body_html:
I have been trying to get a build with working Conv1d with dilations, as per issue #967.
On Ubuntu 16.04, the dockerized CUDNN6 build throws the following error.

body:
I have been trying to get a build with working Conv1d with dilations, as per issue #967. 
On Ubuntu 16.04, the dockerized CUDNN6 build throws the following error. 

```
True
CUDNN  VERSION 6005
Float
THCudaCheck FAIL file=/tmp/pip-8e667l95-build/torch/lib/THC/generated/../generic/THCTensorMathPointwise.cu line=246 error=8 : invalid device function
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "test_dilation.py", line 33, in <module>
    output.backward(output.data)
  File "/opt/conda/envs/pytorch-py35/lib/python3.5/site-packages/torch/autograd/variable.py", line 146, in backward
    self._execution_engine.run_backward((self,), (gradient,), retain_variables)
RuntimeError: cuda runtime error (8) : invalid device function at /tmp/pip-8e667l95-build/torch/lib/THC/generated/../generic/THCTensorMathPointwise.cu:246
```
